item.title: Unmute command [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok been trying to make an unmute command since ppl get mad about being muted but im 2 lazy 2 go into my massive character file folders…

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && playerRights >= 1) { // made by gir
String victim = command.substring(6);

            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully unmuted"); // made by Musicmad	
                mutedate = 0;
                muted = 0;
                sendMessage(
                        "You have been unmuted by " + playerName);

} else {
sendMessage(“it didn’t work”);
}[/code]

wat i got so far…

need it 2 do the mutedate = 0;
muted = 0;
sendMessage(“unmuted by name”);
2 be done on the person named

::unmute gir

gir gets unmuted
person doing command you unmuted gir
gir you have been unmuted by +plyrname+

so help

Read full topic
